question: I have been getting many doubtful thoughts from shaitaan and my heart is very doubtful now, my inner self is now also starting to ask silly questions now. How can i cure this doubtful heart?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The doubtful questions which disturbs you can be referred to your spiritual
guide. In the meanwhile we advise you recite - Laa Howla Wa Laa Qouwwatta
Illa Billah with the intention of dispelling the evil thoughts.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best.

Mufti E. Desai
